O jogo em si é ótimo,mas,depois de completar o modo campanha inteiro,fica sem graça,a única coisa que tem pra fazer é jogar co-op daí.
Amazing game! Totally worth buying! Fun to play with friends!

If you're looking for something that can test your multi level thinking and stretch your patience to the limits, look no more because you found it.

It's cooperation mode is perfect if you want to see your friend struggle with test rooms and watch them fall fow to the fiery pit of failure.

I can't count how many times i spent hours just to solve one goddamn room from community.

Anyway just buy it: it's fun, cheap and most importantly THE CAKE IS A LIE
You know who thinks Half-Life 2 is better than this game? Hitler.
Portal needs no introduction, and its sequel is a masterfully crafted puzzle game with an incredibly well-written story. 10/10, would recommend.
Why are you reading this as if you haven't played this game? Stop reading this and go play this game!

Tem uma trilha incrível, modo de jogo inovador e diferente dos demais, além da possibilidade de jogar multiplayer em comparação ao seu antecessor. Não requer uma setup avançada do computador (roda até em um celeron!). É um ótimo investimento, vale a pena jogar!
